next_actions: Prototype pooled-wave or reweighted PPO runs to see whether the H3 ≥$10M contrast can achieve acceptable power (effective n>1k) before requesting a confirmatory freeze.
Draft the formal `religiosity_class_gradients` promotion memo (final PAP text, manuscript cites, BH justification) so the moderate/serious contrasts can be frozen once reviewers agree.
Stress-test the serious-practice interaction (e.g., shrinkage or alternative anxiety codings) to decide if it remains in the confirmatory family or drops to exploratory supporting status.
